Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your operations and bring substantial value to your business. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, the product is worth $12,000 to you. I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $10,000, which I believe is a fair and competitive offer considering its high value to you. This opportunity won't last long, so I encourage you to consider this offer carefully. If you have any questions or need more information, please don't hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $10,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $10,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
